author: DistroTube
description:
On this episode of Hey DT:

0:00 Intro
0:18 What kind of virtualisation do you use?
1:38 What is your favorite linux command? 
3:23 Could you maybe make a guide on doom emacs...
4:29 Your steering wheel on the wrong side of the car hmm.
6:36 How did you paint your terminal, added colors?
7:37 The 'shuf' command doesn't need 'seq' or 'head' commands to do what you show...
8:46 Can you please turn the Hey DT series into a podcast with RSS feeds so that I can listen to it from a podcast client?
9:38 You say we should never take offense to what others say, but why is it wrong to get offended?  Isn't it my right to be offended by something?
14:46 Thanks to Patrons

title: Hey, DT! What's Your Favorite Linux Commands?
